post.body:
Playing Prey today.. Im a bit meh about it :/
I see that it wants to be a DeusEx or maybe even a System Shock. But it just doesnt feel right, i think its the blend of horror they have attempted to mix in... Something none of the above have.
And the bland combat against the black somethings :(  Oh how do i wish i was playing Prey 2 and chasing down alien scum as a bounty hunter instead.
